content.raw:
I think you sorted this out, but just for reference: the problem here was not a shared/static mismatch, as it is perfectly fine to mix static and shared libraries. 

The one thing that needs to be consistent is that the different libraries should use the same run-time library compiler option [1]. 

[1] : https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj889284.aspx
